name: Tricks 'N' Treats
description:
Take Skelly on a Halloween adventure through the cemetery to try and find his resting place. Evil pumpkins and bats will try and stop you, but will you let them? Dangers and secrets await you on your journey. Dare to enter? What awaits Skelly in the end? Good luck and enjoy some "Tricks 'N' Treats" Happy Halloween!

- Submitted for 2022 Spooky Scary Skeleton Game Jam.

~ Skelly

*GameMaker Notes if you press Alt + Enter in game it will make full screen and same to reverse.*
